title: [FIXED] Store Issues - 28/05 12:42pm AEDT
body:
EDIT: We restarted the store and it appears to have cleared up the issues we were seeing. It is now re-enabled. If you see any other issues please reply to this thread.

_______________________________________________________________________

Hello Everyone,

We are having issues with the store and you may not be able to access it, or see "Session Expired". We are working to resolve this now and I will update as soon as there is more to share. Sorry for the inconvenience this may cause you.

-Riot Cochese

replies.body:
A red discussion with no comments on it.

How very odd.
